Module com.banking.revampinterface
Package com.banking.revampinterface

Class TransactionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.banking.revampinterface.TransactionManagerController
public class TransactionManagerController extends Object
This class defines the Transaction Manager Controller in the MVC design pattern for the bank account interface
Author:
Aveesh Patel, Patryk Dziedzic
